actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend Title 18, United States Code, with respect to possession of material involving sexual exploitation of minors.

summary.text: Anti-Child Pornography Possession Act of 1990 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit the possession or viewing of visual depictions of sexually explicit conduct involving minors if such depictions have been or will be transported in interstate or foreign commerce.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title 18, United States Code, with respect to possession of material involving sexual exploitation of minors.
